Calculate rice score

Source: R/rice.R
rice.Rd

Calculate rice score

rice(x, ...)

# S3 method for voteList
rice(x, minvotes = 10, ...)

Arguments

x

A voteList object
...

Other parameters passed on.
minvotes

The minimum number of votes for a party to have participated in. Defaults to 10.

Value

A list of rice scores.

Methods (by class)

  • voteList: Rice index for voteList object

Examples

rice(examplevotes)
